page.title: 10TICKHILL INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: We did a{survey}in the middle school, the age range was 8_12 years.There are 120 children included in this survey. At the end these were the results:6 had Vic 20,7 had Commodore,19 had a BBC and 19 had Spectrum.Altogether in the middle school.44{computers}are owned.38 owners use them for games, 27 for programming,8 for designing and 8 for accounts.We are both looking forward to the day when we can program computers properly.We like computers because we can play games on them and program them.We think that computers may control a whole house one day and perhaps cars could be driven by them.
